column6: X-23's bloody past continues to unfold, and the man called Wolverine is haunting her every step of the way!  What is Trigger Scent, and what are the Facility's plans to re-capture X-23?  And what does the Kingpin of Crime have to do with it?  Captain America and Daredevil are along for the ride as X-23 digs her claws deeper into the Marvel Universe, and not everyone is going to make it out alive.
column8: | penciller (cover):Michael Choi | writer:Craig Kyle | writer:Chris Yost | colorist:Sonia Oback | letterer:Troy Peteri
